title: Any webdevs in PESU?
content: Is learning web dev with the academically rigorous PES curriculum difficult? I ask this because I'm not too certain if webdev is part of the curriculum or not. If it is, then I guess it's not that big of a deal?

comments.body: It is a part of the curriculum as far as I can remember we had it in the 3rd semester. But you ll sctually learn through projects and hacks
Do you mean projects and hacks that we seek out ourselves?

Projects yes although you will have a web dev project u have to do for ur sem 3 course where you can choose what u wanna make
Hacks there are many within pesu itself so shudnt be a problem
